SELECT L.ID AS LAUNCHER_ID, L.NAME AS LAUNCHER_NAME, L.MODEL AS LAUNCHER_MODEL,
S.ID AS SCM_ID, S.NAME AS SCM_NAME, S.ACCESS_TOKEN AS SCM_ACCESS_TOKEN, S.ORGANIZATION AS SCM_ORGANIOZATION, S.REPO AS SCM_REPO, S.AVATAR_URL AS SCM_AVATAR_URL, S.REPOSITORY_URL AS SCM_REPOSITORY_URL, S.USER_ID AS SCM_USER_ID, S.MODIFIED_AT AS SCM_MODIFIED_AT, S.CREATED_AT AS SCM_CREATED_AT,
J.ID AS JOB_ID, J.USER_ID AS JOB_USER_ID, J.NAME AS JOB_NAME, J.JOB_URL AS JOB_JOB_URL, J.JENKINS_HOST AS JOB_JENKINS_HOST, J.MODIFIED_AT AS JOB_MODIFIED_AT, J.CREATED_AT AS JOB_CREATED_AT,
L.CREATED_AT AS LAUNCHER_CREATED_AT, L.MODIFIED_AT AS _MODIFIED_AT FROM LAUNCHERS L LEFT JOIN SCM S ON L.SCM_ID = S.ID LEFT JOIN JOBS J ON J.ID = L.JOB_ID
